ygData.subject: Re: lavastorm
ygData.msgSnippet: It dropped a nightmare hide A5 5 Effect Restore Sight
ygData.messageBody:
It dropped a nightmare hide A5 5 Effect Restore Sight


>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] lavastorm
>Date: Tue, 06 Jul 1999 15:43:30 PDT
>
>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>
>one time i was hunting in lavastorm, and i saw a black horse mob called a
>'Lesser Nightmare'. it conned red, so i didnt go near it, but it was a
>hostile one. anyone know about it, or what kind of loot it could have,
>etc?
> or was the heat getting to me =)
>
>belphenor
>
>
>
>>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>>
>>
>>----- Original Message -----
>>From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>>Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 2:14 AM
>>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hunting at 14..
>>
>>
>> > From: Brian J Ferguson <bjf10@...>
>> >
>> > I can kill nearly all fire elementals in Lavastorm at level 13, most
>>near
>> > the entrance /con blue to me... And they give quite a good amount of
>>exp.
>> > Lava basilisks are good targets as well.
>>
>>I went back to lavastorm at level 22, and found a fire elemental that was
>>blue ;) that's why I said he should stay away from them. There are some
>>that are *very* tough. Plus the fact that their fire shields will more
>>often than not, kill your pet. I figure if someone is confident enough in
>>their abilities, they will eventually try everything in a zone, I just
>>like
>>to tell peeps what the easiest mobs are, and which ones can potentially
>>destroy you in an instant.
>>
>>
>>
